text: Lynn Faulds Wood (25 March 1948 â€“ 24 April 2020) was a Scottish television presenter and journalist. She was born in Glasgow. She was known for her works on TV-am, BBC Breakfast Time, Watchdog, GMTV and Watchdog: Test House. She worked for the BBC and ITV. Wood died on 24 April 2020 of a stroke, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:BBC people Category:Scottish journalists Category:ITV presenters Category:Television personalities from Glasgow Category:Scottish television presenters
title: Lynn Faulds Wood
